Due to dbd being the monopoly of the asymetrical horror genre {for now..} the Devs of this game have gotten lazier and lazier over time resulting in most updates coming out full of bugs and taking 2-3 weeks to fix. 
The Dev team have lost the passion imo over time resulting in slow updates and bad balancing decisions which is a shame to see.
I hate this game and that's why I play it almost every day.
It's sad to see a game with so much potential in the hands of such incompetent devs.

I am writing this review because I feel I been going around it and still giving this game a chance everyday,but today is what broke me 
no it wasnt the bad teammates or ranking system
it was the game itself 
the game is amazing and great WHEN IT WORKS
and to the balancing what sometimes just breaks me mostly in the killer side.
as some killers sound good and look great but they were balanced while they were looking at another game,some are either not fun to play as and against due how badly they are balanced or really lack any counter play sure as the spirit I really thought one of most broken killer would be fixed in the end but after 2 years or more they didn't even the dbd tips and guides fail to help do the fact using a perk to silent you can be broken by an other perk as her power take you to another world making you unable to see the humans but can hear them so all you need is to be a rank 1 spirit is a good headset and basic perks that you can unlock within 20 hours of gameplay if you were below your everyday player as my 9 years old was able to get a 4k after watching me show him how its played ,its just the killer is not fun to play against and with and her power really needs to be rework as you dont know if she used her power or where is she going with it leaving you in a game where you just have to guess,I never in my life seen a game where i was put into a guessing game when someone click m2 and there is NO downside of using her powers like most killers and here is the list where killers go into a dazed state when they use they power ONCE
NURSE: GOES in a dazed stated after using her power as she blinks around and swing once hit or not she get put into dazed state
CANNIBAL: goes into a dazed state with a power they need to be charged up that can wipe a team at once hitting a wall during it put him into a daze as well
Oni needs to charge it with blood and goes into a daze state when he uses it and its finished
Blight: goes into a state of daze injecting his power into himself hit or not
Legion : goes into a state of daze hit or not
as you see there is many killers who have her style of play but she is the only one who doesn't go into a state of daze after using her powers at all
and Whats worst Most killers who have a bad day or legit babies who enjoy winning easily use her or lack power in their life as they know they will make someone sad or upset ,sure you can call me salty all you want but its a very unhealthy killer to play as when the day her nerf comes and she drops from easy baby mode there is no killer for you to play as strong as her and it legit made alot of people stop playing the game or switch to only playing her to have a power trip of their own.

Wonder if it's called "dead by daylight" beacause you will be dead by dayligt from waiting for a match... i mean come on devs... 

I playing session goes like this:

Me - Oh, mabye i should play som dbd? (gets exited)
Game - starts up. 
Me - Press ready.
Game - Let the waiting game begin!
Me - stares at the lobby for 5 mins.
Game - nothing
Me - Tabs and stats to watch a youtube video.
Game - nothing. 
Me - Youtube video ended, tabs back.
Game - nothing.
Me - Fu** this s*it (Ends game).

This is legit the process every time, I can't recommend this.

I have around 200+ hours in this game at the time of this review and I can say this is easily one of the best multiplayer games I've ever played. A ton of multiplayer games can get old and tiring after a good amount of time but this game never seems to feel like that too me whenever I boot it up to play! I'm a HUGE survival horror game fan and it's so nice to finally have an actual good survival horror multiplayer game! The idea of playing Hide-n-Go Seek with a killer is such a great concept to me! Even though the downfall of this game usually are campers, cheaters, and "new to the game" teammates, this game never really makes me feel like I'm "burned out". this game is a 9/10 in my book!
